org.lightningj.paywall.vo

Class OrderRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lightningj.paywall.JSONParsable
      • org.lightningj.paywall.tokengenerator.JWTClaim
        • org.lightningj.paywall.vo.OrderRequest

  • public class OrderRequest
extends JWTClaim
    OrderRequest contains values generated from related PaymentRequired annotation and is used as a basis for creating a payment flow in PaymentHandler. Created by Philip Vendil on 2018-12-07.

    • Constructor Detail

      • OrderRequest

        public OrderRequest()
        Empty Constructor

      • OrderRequest

        public OrderRequest(java.lang.String articleId,
                    int calculatedUnits,
                    java.util.List<PaymentOption> paymentOptions,
                    boolean payPerRequest)
        Default constructor.
        Parameters:
        articleId - the article id derived from PaymentRequired notation and OrderRequestGenerator.
        calculatedUnits - the calculated units for paymentRequiredAnnotation unit calculator.
        paymentOptions - optional payment options which can be custom values defined between PaymentRequired annotation and used PaymentHandler.
        payPerRequest - true if payment only should be valid for one payment, set by annotation, but PaymentHandler might override this setting. Important: If used must PaymentData implementation implement PerRequestPaymentData.

      • OrderRequest

        public OrderRequest(javax.json.JsonObject jsonObject)
             throws javax.json.JsonException
        JSON Parseable constructor
        Parameters:
        jsonObject - the json object to parse
        Throws:
        javax.json.JsonException

        Parse from JWTClaims constructor
        Parameters:
        jwtClaims - the JWT Tokens Claim set to extract data from.
